verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARG1: he is moving to finalize trade sanctions against China even as a US delegation is set to travel to Beijing for talks to resolve the dispute] .
President Donald Trump said Tuesday he [V: is] moving to finalize trade sanctions against China even as a US delegation is set to travel to Beijing for talks to resolve the dispute .

President Donald Trump said Tuesday [ARG0: he] is [V: moving] [ARG1: to finalize trade sanctions against China] [ARGM-TMP: even as a US delegation is set to travel to Beijing for talks to resolve the dispute] .

President Donald Trump said Tuesday he is moving to finalize trade sanctions against China even as a US delegation [V: is] set to travel to Beijing for talks to resolve the dispute .
President Donald Trump said Tuesday he is moving to finalize trade sanctions against China even as [ARG1: a US delegation] is [V: set] [ARG2: to travel to Beijing for talks to resolve the dispute] .

President Donald Trump said Tuesday he is moving to finalize trade sanctions against China even as [ARG0: a US delegation] is set to [V: travel] [ARG1: to Beijing] [ARGM-PRP: for talks to resolve the dispute] .
President Donald Trump said Tuesday he is moving to finalize trade sanctions against China even as a US delegation is set to travel to Beijing for talks to [V: resolve] [ARG1: the dispute] .
